content:
As an AI language model, I don't have access to specific information on any brand's promotional tactics. However, I can give you a general example.

A brand may introduce an online community platform or digital forum where customers can interact with each other and the company, share their feedback and ideas, and participate in various activities. The brand could leverage technology by integrating interactive features such as social media integrations, live chats, polls, surveys, and discussion boards to encourage user participation and collaboration.

The brand could also use data analytics and AI tools to gain insights into consumer preferences and behaviors, which could inform the design of new products, services, and marketing campaigns. By building a strong and engaged online community, the brand may foster a sense of loyalty, trust, and advocacy among its customers, which could lead to increased brand awareness and revenue.
